New Records: Khama Billiat scored a penalty to secure Zimbabwe's 1-0 win over Namibia
Key Match Events: Billiat converted a penalty after a foul by Namibia's Kennedy Amutenya
Namibia's Prins Tjiueza hit the woodwork twice
Zimbabwe maintained pressure throughout the match
Pre-Game Insights: Zimbabwe was expected to perform well after returning to South African soil
Cape Town-based players were monitored for their fitness
Post-Match Reflections: Cape Town-based players were monitored for their fitness
Zimbabwe secured all three points in matchday three of the 2025 Africa Cup of Nations qualifiers
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Orlando Stadium in front of a packed crowd
Zimbabwe dominated possession but struggled to convert chances into goals
Namibia pushed hard in the closing stages but couldn't equalize
